Happy Hour Vancouver

**Updated October 14th 2019**
Below you will find an alphabetical list and map of over 120 restaurants, bars and pubs in Vancouver with happy hour menus. Click on the restaurant name or pin on the map below to view their current happy hour times and specials.

View Late Night Happy Hour Menus



While we strive to check that each happy hour menu on this page is up to date, the specials listed here may change without notice. If you plan to visit any location for a specific happy hour item, it's best to check with the restaurant ahead of time.
